# üìù ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ Implement Story (‡∏â‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ö‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏à‡∏á‡πà‡∏≤‡∏¢)

## üöÄ ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏£?

### ‡∏Ç‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà 1: ‡∏≠‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏à Story
```markdown
1. ‡∏≠‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô Story Summary ‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏à‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏≥‡∏≠‡∏∞‡πÑ‡∏£

```

### ‡∏Ç‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà 2: ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏´‡πå‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô

### ‡∏Ç‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà 3: ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏° Implement
```markdown
1. ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á branch ‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà: feature/STORY-XXX
2. ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å AC ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏á‡πà‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î

5. ‡∏ó‡∏î‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î
```

## ‚úÖ Checklist ‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≥

### üìã ‡πÄ‡∏ä‡πá‡∏Ñ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°

- [ ] ‡∏°‡∏µ branch ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö story ‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πâ‡πÅ‡∏•‡πâ‡∏ß

### üéØ ‡πÄ‡∏ä‡πá‡∏Ñ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏ö‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡∏ï‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô

- [ ] ‡∏£‡∏π‡πâ‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏£
- [ ] ‡∏£‡∏π‡πâ‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á validate ‡∏≠‡∏∞‡πÑ‡∏£‡∏ö‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á

## üõ† Template ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ô‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏î

### Template ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö AC ‡πÅ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠
```markdown
## AC[X]: [‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠ AC]

### üìù ‡∏™‡∏¥‡πà‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏≥:
- [ ] ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á UI components
- [ ] ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ô business logic
- [ ] ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏° validation
- [ ] ‡∏à‡∏±‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£ error handling
- [ ] ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ô unit tests
- [ ] ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ô E2E tests

### üé® UI Components:
- Component ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á: [‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠]
- Props ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö: [‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£]
- Events ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏à‡∏±‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£: [‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£]

### üß† Business Logic:
- Functions ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ô: [‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠]
- Data validation: [‡∏Å‡∏Å‡∏é‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ä‡πá‡∏Ñ]
- Error cases: [‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏µ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏≠‡∏≤‡∏à‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏û‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏î]

### ‚úÖ Test Cases:
- Happy path: [‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏µ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏õ‡∏Å‡∏ï‡∏¥]
- Edge cases: [‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏µ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏ö‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡∏ï]
- Error cases: [‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏µ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏û‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏î]
```

### Template ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö E2E Tests
```javascript
describe('STORY-XXX: [‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠ Story]', () => {
  beforeEach(() => {
    // Setup test data
  });

  describe('AC1: [‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠ AC]', () => {
    it('should [‡∏™‡∏¥‡πà‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏Ç‡∏∂‡πâ‡∏ô] when [‡πÄ‡∏á‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏Ç]', () => {
      // Given: ‡πÄ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏™‡∏ñ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ì‡πå
      
      // When: ‡∏ó‡∏≥‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ó‡∏≥
      
      // Then: ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏•‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ò‡πå
    });

    it('should handle error when [‡πÄ‡∏á‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏û‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏î]', () => {
      // Test error scenarios
    });
  });
});
```

## üìö Quick Reference ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡πÅ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏•‡∏∞ Story

### STORY-001: Basic Todo Management
```markdown
üéØ Focus: CRUD operations, simple UI
üìù Key ACs: Create, Read, Update, Delete, Mark Complete
üß™ E2E Priority: Create task ‚Üí Mark complete ‚Üí Delete
‚ö†Ô∏è ‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏Ñ‡∏±‡∏ç: Data validation, Confirmation dialogs
```

### STORY-002: Search and Filtering
```markdown
üéØ Focus: Search functionality, Filter UI
üìù Key ACs: Keyword search, Status filter, Date filter, Clear filters
üß™ E2E Priority: Search ‚Üí Filter ‚Üí Combine ‚Üí Clear
‚ö†Ô∏è ‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏Ñ‡∏±‡∏ç: Search performance, Filter combinations
```

### STORY-003: Data Quality & Reliability
```markdown
üéØ Focus: Validation, Error handling, Data safety
üìù Key ACs: Validation, Duplicate detection, Reliable operations, Error handling
üß™ E2E Priority: Validation errors ‚Üí Recovery scenarios ‚Üí Data safety
‚ö†Ô∏è ‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏Ñ‡∏±‡∏ç: User-friendly error messages, Data consistency
```

### STORY-004: Demo Simulation
```markdown
üéØ Focus: Sample data, Demo flow, Realistic scenarios
üìù Key ACs: Pre-loaded data, Realistic variety, Smooth demo flow
üß™ E2E Priority: Demo scenarios ‚Üí All features working smoothly
‚ö†Ô∏è ‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏Ñ‡∏±‡∏ç: Demo data quality, Performance during demo
```

## üé≠ E2E Testing Strategy

### üé¨ Test Scenarios ‡∏ï‡∏≤‡∏° User Journey

#### New User Experience
```gherkin
Feature: New User First Time Use
  Scenario: User creates their first task
    Given I am a new user with no tasks
    When I create my first task "Buy milk"
    Then I should see the task in my list
    And the task should show "Not Started" status
```

#### Daily Usage Patterns
```gherkin
Feature: Daily Task Management
  Scenario: User manages tasks throughout the day
    Given I have several tasks for today
    When I mark some tasks as complete
    And I add new urgent tasks
    Then my task list should reflect all changes
    And completed tasks should look different
```

#### Advanced Features
```gherkin
Feature: Power User Workflows
  Scenario: User searches and filters large task list
    Given I have 50+ tasks in various states
    When I search for "meeting" and filter by "today"
    Then I should see only relevant tasks
    And search results should be highlighted
```

### üîß E2E Test Setup
```javascript
// cypress/support/commands.js
Cypress.Commands.add('createTask', (title, description) => {
  cy.get('[data-cy=add-task-button]').click();
  cy.get('[data-cy=task-title]').type(title);
  cy.get('[data-cy=task-description]').type(description);
  cy.get('[data-cy=save-task]').click();
});

Cypress.Commands.add('markTaskComplete', (taskTitle) => {
  cy.contains('[data-cy=task-item]', taskTitle)
    .find('[data-cy=complete-checkbox]')
    .click();
});
```

### üìä Test Data Management
```javascript
// cypress/fixtures/sample-tasks.json
{
  "basicTasks": [
    {
      "title": "Morning standup meeting",
      "description": "Daily team sync at 9 AM",
      "status": "not-started",
      "dueDate": "today"
    }
  ],
  "demoTasks": [
    // Pre-loaded tasks for demo scenarios
  ]
}
```

## üöÄ ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô Prompt ‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πâ

### ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ:
1. ‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Å Story ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏à‡∏∞‡∏ó‡∏≥ (‡πÄ‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ô STORY-001)
2. ‡∏≠‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô Quick Reference ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö story ‡∏ô‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô
3. ‡∏ó‡∏≥‡∏ï‡∏≤‡∏° Checklist ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏Ç‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ô
4. ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ Template ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ô‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏î‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ tests
5. ‡πÄ‡∏ä‡πá‡∏Ñ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏™‡∏°‡∏ö‡∏π‡∏£‡∏ì‡πå‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô submit

### Tips ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏™‡∏≥‡πÄ‡∏£‡πá‡∏à:
- **‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏á‡πà‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô** - ‡∏ó‡∏≥ AC ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏á‡πà‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô
- **Test ‡∏ï‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏≤** - ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏≠‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏™‡∏£‡πá‡∏à‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≠‡∏¢ test
- **Think like user** - ‡∏Ñ‡∏¥‡∏î‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏°‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏ô‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏à‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏á
- **Document as you go** - ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ô docs ‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡πÜ ‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏î

---
*üìù Prompt ‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏≠‡∏Å‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏á‡πà‡∏≤‡∏¢ ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏à‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ó‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏•‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏∏‡∏Å story ‡πÉ‡∏ô Todo Application*
